result.query_interpretation: Analyzed all log streams in the 'production-api' log group in the last 2 hours for all error types.

errors.sample_message: Request to external payment gateway timed out after 30s
Unhandled NullReferenceException in OrdersController at line 221
Unable to connect to user-db cluster: connection refused

patterns.description: TimeoutError incidents spike every full hour, suggesting an issue with external payment gateway during peak loads.

anomalies.description: Noticeable increase in TimeoutErrors and DatabaseConnectionError at the 14:00 UTC mark, deviating from the baseline error rate.

insights.summary: Multiple TimeoutErrors and DatabaseConnectionErrors occurred in the last 2 hours, peaking at the top of the hour. NullReferenceExceptions are persistent but less frequent.

peak_times.reason: Increased load triggered TimeoutErrors to payment gateway and database connection failures.

trends: TimeoutErrors spike during peak load intervals
Recurring NullReferenceException in OrdersController may indicate unhandled edge cases
recommendations: Investigate payment gateway performance and potential rate limiting during peak times
Review OrdersController logic for null checks to prevent NullReferenceExceptions
Analyze database connection pool settings to address intermittent DatabaseConnectionError incidents

formatted_results.message: Request to external payment gateway timed out after 30s
Unhandled NullReferenceException in OrdersController at line 221
Unable to connect to user-db cluster: connection refused
